nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Head to Head
Star Wars Rebels: Head to Head is a young readers book from the Star Wars Rebels series, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
The wildest Star Wars Rebels matchups you've ever seen--with the newest and coolest Star Wars characters!

Star Wars Rebels: Head to Head features information on 26 match-ups found within the Star Wars Rebels television series. Included with each match-up is detailed information on each combatant, such as homeworld and species for organic combatants, and manufacturer and speed for mechanical ones. Color pictures of all are provided, and there are also spotlight sections such as an exploration of the Ghost and a detailed look at specialized weaponry like the Grand Inquisitor's lightsaber.
Star Wars Rebels: Head to Head is a follow-up to two previous titles: Star Wars: Head-to-Head and Star Wars: Head-to-Head Tag Teams, both of which are pictured on the back cover.
On page 9, Cumberlayne Aresko's first name is misspelled as "Cumberlyn."
